channel.title: KP More than a Voice
channel.description: I want every podcast episode to be helpful to not only myself but to other souls as well. I‚Äôm practicing vulnerability as well as trying to get others to be just as vulnerable. Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to give my voice a listen. It is much appreciated, peace, love, positivity brings me happiness. Happiness brings me power. KP More than a Voice Kody Pitts
channel.author: Kody Pitts

item.title: Growth and Vulnerability üåπ (ft. Mia Dee) üåª
item.description: In this episode we discuss what it truly means to be vulnerable with yourself as well as other people. We also discuss how we deal with growing pains and what helps get through tough times when you‚Äôre trying to grow as a person. This episode was heart felt and helped a lot with being vulnerable with my art and poetry. Thank you guys for being loyal fans to my podcast and thank you guys for listening. I hope you guys enjoy. Don‚Äôt forget to tell someone you love them. Peace, Love, Positivity brings me Happiness, Happiness brings me power. üåπ

item.title: Watering Flowers with Knowledge üåπ (ft. Tytus Simmons)
item.description: This episode I have a chance to catch with someone who I‚Äôve always looked up to but never got the chance to pick his mind the way I wanted to, but in this episode I do. He explains his transformation into who he is today and spits nothing but knowledge, wisdom, and advice to how others can better themselves. You will definitely get a lot out of this episode. Also follow his art page @abso.aart, nothing but creativity and brilliance from him. Thank you Tytus for coming on and I hope you guys enjoy listening as much as I enjoyed having the conversation. Peace, Love and Positivity my beautiful people üåπ

item.title: Roses in Bloom üåπüåπ (ft. Michael Owoaje)
item.description: This episode is a deep discussion between two friends who have grown together since elementary to now men. We share past experiences and what we want the future to hold for us. Please enjoy this episode that only brought joy and smiles.

item.title: The Seed That Planted the Rose üåπ (ft. Percy Pitts aka my pops)
item.description: In this episode my father and I have a conversation that we‚Äôve had many times over but would like to share it to the world. This episode is one of my most emotional episodes and I will keep dear to my heart. I hope that you all will get something from our conversation and will appreciate the vulnerability from our conversation. Thank you all for tuning in and I hope you enjoy it. For my listeners I apologize for my inconsistency and will try my best to be more active. Please be patient because I‚Äôm going to try to give you all my best work. Thank you again for listening. Peace, Love, and Positivity brings me happiness. Happiness brings me Power. From another episode of KP More Than A Voice, Peace with Love üåπ

item.title: Views of the World from Two Black Kings (ft. Christian Santifer) ü§¥üèæü§¥üèæüåπ
item.description: In this episode you will see two different viewpoints from two Black Kings. We will get into detail about our views on America as Black men, on society, social media, love and the future. This talk is with life long brothers and I hope you guys can relate and enjoy this talk as well. Thank you guys for tuning in. Peace, Love, Positivity brings me Happiness. Happiness brings me power ‚ù§Ô∏èüåπ

item.title: Self Reflecting with Chakras üåπüîÆ
item.description: This episode I‚Äôm self reflecting on my past decisions and moments I wish I could relive. I found a new way to help better myself and come to peace with a lot of my thoughts. Chakras are what helped me and I‚Äôm going to try and give you guys the same outlet I was able to have. Hopefully it‚Äôs helpful and you guys will take it and run with it. Peace with love ‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: The Perspective of Pain from a Wilted Rose ü•Äüëë
item.description: This episode is about being comfortable with the thought of pain. Pain is not always going to have a negative effect on you. It could lead you to bigger goals, bigger opportunities, chances for growth, and chances to heal. Pain is necessary depending on your perspective. I hope you enjoy it. Peace with love. ‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: Introduction to a Young Black King. üëëüåπ KP More than a Voice
item.description: WELCOME! To my first ever podcast episode for my podcast KP More than a Voice. Starting with this podcast I hope to touch as many souls as possible and make sure that people understand vulnerability and pain are not scary subjects. They are bridges to new beginnings and new opportunities that we haven‚Äôt even scratched the surface with yet. I hope that you enjoy the thoughts I have in my head and you desire more because I‚Äôm coming with heat I‚Äôm telling you. But thank you for listening. Peace, love, positivity gives me happiness. Happiness gives me power. Peace with love.
